name: Octsegmentation
tagline: Reference Code for the publication "Probabilistic Intra-Retinal Layer Segmentation in 3-D OCT Images Using Global Shape Regularization"
body:
# Retina Segmentation Toolbox

Welcome to the project page for the Retina Segmentation Toolbox.

You can download the current version of the toolbox using the link above. The current version is 1.0 (30-04-2014).

This project is under GPL v2, "a copyleft license that requires anyone who distributes code or a derivative work to make the source available under the same terms." For full details, see the LICENSE file provided in the project folder.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
